name: Shard Defenders: Excavator
description:
A very early prototype of a first person RPG.

"Shard Defenders: Excavator" is a first person RPG where you are a "Shard Defender" tasked to enter caverns and complete objectives to save the world.

Early version prototype focuses on world display and generation. There is not much gameplay but everything except the font is made by me.

= Credits =
HokuHakase - Game Design, Programming, Art
